job_tasks.phrase: coordinate all the activities related to developing new exams, translating existing exams to several different languages, updating the exams to current standards during maintenance, and implementing exam products in the various systems.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the coordination and implementation of products within systems, which aligns with the general software development and integration lifecycle.

job_tasks.phrase: collaborate closely with the Exam Developers to integrate generative AI solutions into our processes.
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions the integration of AI solutions into existing processes, a core task of an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer.

job_tasks.phrase: translate internal guidelines into machine learning algorithms
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to the development of machine learning algorithms based on specific guidelines, fitting the definition of model development.

job_tasks.phrase: Coordinating work with subject matter experts and cooperating with third parties in creating, localizing, implementing and maintaining exam products
job_tasks.justification: This describes the coordination and maintenance of products, which falls under software development and integration activities.

job_tasks.phrase: Ensuring that deliverables are in line with high-quality standards, are within budget, and delivered on time
job_tasks.justification: This relates to the management and delivery aspects of software products, aligning with software development practices.

job_tasks.phrase: (Co)developing and improving exam products in line with guidelines for educational measurement
job_tasks.justification: This involves the development and improvement of products based on specific guidelines, which can include algorithmic or model-based improvements.

job_tasks.phrase: Testing exam products (exams and corresponding materials) for the other team members
job_tasks.justification: Testing is a fundamental part of the software development lifecycle.

job_tasks.phrase: Independently writing and maintaining machine learning algorithms complying with standards, best practices and company policies
job_tasks.justification: This is a direct mention of writing and maintaining machine learning algorithms, which is a core task in model development.

job_tasks.phrase: Supporting our Customer Success Center by preparing responses to customer questions on the content of the exams
job_tasks.justification: This involves supporting existing products and customer interactions, which is an aspect of product lifecycle management within software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Detecting (using test analysis) and resolving issues related to the exam products, and performing root cause analyses to take corrective actions
job_tasks.justification: Issue detection, root cause analysis, and corrective actions are standard practices in software maintenance and development.

job_tasks.phrase: Keeping your knowledge in the domain up-to-date
job_tasks.justification: While also a soft skill, in the context of a technical role, keeping knowledge up-to-date is crucial for effective software development and integration of new technologies.
This is a general professional activity related to representing the company, often associated with roles that have a product or technical focus.

soft_skills.phrase: align the products in EXIN's certification portfolio are aligned with the needs of the market.
soft_skills.justification: This phrase indicates an understanding of market needs and aligning products accordingly, which falls under business understanding.

soft_skills.phrase: stay up to date with the latest research and developments in the field of AI and machine learning.
soft_skills.justification: This relates to staying current with AI/ML advancements, which is crucial for model development and improvement.

soft_skills.phrase: collaborate closely with the Exam Developers
soft_skills.justification: Directly mentions collaboration with team members.

soft_skills.phrase: Supporting our Customer Success Center by preparing responses to customer questions
soft_skills.justification: This involves communication and support for customers.

soft_skills.phrase: stay up to date with the latest research and developments in the field of AI and machine learning.
soft_skills.justification: This explicitly states the need to keep knowledge current in a rapidly evolving field.

soft_skills.phrase: maintaining legal, qualitative and ethical compliance in the outcomes.
soft_skills.justification: This highlights the importance of adhering to legal, qualitative, and ethical standards.

profile.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on coordinating, developing, implementing, and maintaining exam products within various systems (Macro-Category A tasks). While it mentions integrating generative AI solutions and writing machine learning algorithms, these appear to be enhancements to existing processes rather than the primary focus of the role. The core responsibilities are product development and management, with AI/ML being a component to be integrated and developed within that framework. There is no specific mention of GenAI Specialist tasks like prompt engineering or RAG, nor extensive traditional ML tasks. Therefore, the role is best classified as an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines a blend of traditional product development/coordination tasks and the integration/development of ML algorithms. The emphasis is more on the former, with AI/ML as a supporting element. The distinction between AI-Adjacent and Core roles is clear based on the described responsibilities. The confidence is high, but not perfect, as the depth of AI/ML involvement is not as detailed as in a 'Core' role.
